channel.title: Anime (new threads)
channel.description: Threads in the forum category "Anime" - Discussions of Anime

item.title: join Omerta village they are doing impossible mission
Bleach
item.content:encoded:
Bleach thread started.
HAPPY FACE!

talk about episodes, moments and events in bleach you like/dislike.
if you had a shikai and/or bankai what would you want/what would suit your style?

I'll start.

Shikai
Lightning affinity, more than likely giving a speed increase. a silver bladed katana, with a oval shaped crossguard

Bankai
substantial power increase, medium speed increase. a red-hued blade that is double sided towards the top quarter of the blade. blade appearance is a Dadao
(for those of you who dont know, its a 2-handed chinese greatsword. tristan wields one in the 2004 version of king arthur)

item.title: My/My Girlfriends list XD combinations ftw ^^

Ok I've posted this list many a time now ^^ on many a forum, and I'll say this as I've said for every other forum. If you want something off this list let me know and I'll see if I can find it and give you a link ^^ at any rate without further adieu here's the list:

Moblie Suit Gundam 3-10 Discs

Black Blood Brothers 1-idk how many discs there are lol

Some of these are downloaded but, probably 1/4 of them are now either licensed or impossible to find outside of bittorrent. So unfortunately some of these I wont be able to give you links for. But the popular ones I shouldn't have a problem finding ^^

item.title: Naruto
item.content:encoded: So, I just watched Shippudden 48 last night. Is it just me or is Shippudden moving super, super, super slow?
